text: Machete is a 2010 American action movie. It stars Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro, Jessica Alba, Don Johnson, Michelle Rodriguez, Steven Seagal and Lindsay Lohan. ==References== Category:2010 action movies Category:American action movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies directed by Robert Rodriguez Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movie spin-offs Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about the illegal drug trade
title: Machete (movie)
